Hong Kong's stressful and cramped living conditions often give rise to a formula for murder. The Criminals 2 - Homicides presents four of the more sensational criminal cases in Hong Kong history: a mute boy driven to murder by constant harassment; a furious mammas who hunts down a couple who cheated her; an informer whose greed leads him to ruin; and a landmark case of the murder of a 17-year-old-girl whose body is stuffed inside a television cardboard box.

Part 1: 'The Deaf Mute Killer' - A deaf and mute man is pushed to murder after being wrongly accused of rape. Part 2: 'Mama San'- A brothel madam has a man killed for not paying his debts.
Part 3: 'The Informer' - A traffic cop is murdered by a police informer and his gun stolen. 
Part 4: 'Nude in a Box' - The discovery of the body of a dead woman results in a man being put on trial.
